decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted for application reference 00941/D/P11 (Design and Access Statement received 13th May 2010 and revised drawings Pr/37740/101 revision A and Pr/37740/102 revision A received 27th July 2010) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - No lighting shall be installed on the approved play area or enclosed fencing.

Condition : 4 - The artificial turf pitch shall be managed in accordance with the submitted Management Plan. The pitch shall not be in use after 21:00 Monday - Thursday or 18:00 on Saturdays and there shall be no use of the pitch on Fridays or Sundays.
description: Variation of condition 4 (approved play area only to be used by school) of planning permission number 00941/D/P11 dated 09/08/2010 for the construction of a new artificial turf sports pitch on part of the existing playing field including the erection of ball stop fencing
site_name: Isleworth And Syon School For Boys
